chapters.title: Chapter 14: What Wise Ones Know
chapters.info: Lady Aemlyn Carand, p. 349 (418)—Andoran lady, High Seat of a strong House that supported Morgase during the Succession. Morgase exiled her from Caemlyn as per Gaebril's suggestion. Elayne hopes that she will still support her, but for now she supports Dyelin for the Throne.
